nextActions: Which third-party SMS provider will be used for integration?
Will the organization provide API credentials for the SMS provider?
Can you confirm the exact workflow details and constraints for this requirement?
The capability brief does not explicitly confirm this requirement. Provide supporting evidence or documentation.
proofNotes: Proof verifier checks evidenceQuotes against the Capability Brief text (normalized matching; ellipsis wildcard supported).
The "Evidence mismatch" flag is verifier-owned and is only added/removed by the proof verifier.
Proof totals count unpaired evidence IDs (IDs without quotes) as unverified references (conservative scoring).
Offline mode: deterministic matching between requirements and capability evidence via keyword overlap (conservative).
No capabilities are asserted without attaching a direct capability snippet as evidence.

requirements.text: The system shall support volunteer registration with configurable form fields.
requirements.responseSummary: Supported based on the capability brief evidence cited.
evidenceQuotes: CB-01 ReliefRoster provides web-based volunteer registration with configurable form fields and required/optional validation.

requirements.text: The system shall allow coordinators to create events and define shifts with capacity limits.
requirements.responseSummary: Supported based on the capability brief evidence cited.
evidenceQuotes: CB-02 Coordinators can create events and define shifts with capacity limits; volunteers can self-signup for available shifts.

requirements.text: The system shall allow volunteers to sign up for shifts and receive confirmations.
requirements.responseSummary: Supported based on the capability brief evidence cited.
evidenceQuotes: CB-02 Coordinators can create events and define shifts with capacity limits; volunteers can self-signup for available shifts.

requirements.text: The system shall send automated reminders 24 hours and 2 hours before a shift via email.
requirements.responseSummary: Supported based on the capability brief evidence cited.
evidenceQuotes: CB-03 Automated email confirmations and reminders are supported with configurable schedules (e.g., 24h, 2h).

requirements.text: The system shall support optional SMS reminders (if enabled by the organization).
requirements.responseSummary: Supported in part or requires confirmation based on available evidence.
evidenceQuotes: CB-14 SMS reminders are not included by default; integration is possible via a third-party SMS provider if the organization supplies an account.
gapsOrQuestions: Which third-party SMS provider will be used for integration?
Will the organization provide API credentials for the SMS provider?

requirements.text: The system shall allow coordinators to mark attendance and record no-shows.
requirements.responseSummary: Supported in part or requires confirmation based on available evidence.
evidenceQuotes: CB-02 Coordinators can create events and define shifts with capacity limits; volunteers can self-signup for available shifts.
gapsOrQuestions: Can you confirm the exact workflow details and constraints for this requirement?

requirements.text: The system shall maintain a volunteer profile including languages, skills, certifications, and availability.
requirements.responseSummary: Supported based on the capability brief evidence cited.
evidenceQuotes: CB-05 Volunteer profiles support skills, language preference, certifications, and availability notes.

requirements.text: The system shall support role-based access (Admin, Coordinator, Volunteer).
requirements.responseSummary: Supported based on the capability brief evidence cited.
evidenceQuotes: CB-06 Role-based access is supported with Admin, Coordinator, and Volunteer roles.

requirements.text: The system shall provide a bilingual messaging option (English/Spanish) for templates.
requirements.responseSummary: Supported based on the capability brief evidence cited.
evidenceQuotes: CB-07 Messaging templates can be authored in English and Spanish; coordinators can choose the template language per send.

requirements.text: The system shall provide a dashboard showing:
requirements.responseSummary: Supported in part or requires confirmation based on available evidence.
gapsOrQuestions: The capability brief does not explicitly confirm this requirement. Provide supporting evidence or documentation.

requirements.text: The system shall support CSV export of volunteer rosters, schedules, and attendance logs.
requirements.responseSummary: Supported based on the capability brief evidence cited.
evidenceQuotes: CB-09 CSV export is supported for rosters, schedules, and attendance logs.

requirements.text: The system shall allow coordinators to broadcast announcements to selected volunteer segments (by skill/language/location).
requirements.responseSummary: Supported based on the capability brief evidence cited.
evidenceQuotes: CB-10 Coordinators can broadcast announcements to volunteer segments (by skill and language preference).

requirements.text: The system shall provide a basic audit log of coordinator actions (event created, shift edited, message sent).
requirements.responseSummary: Supported based on the capability brief evidence cited.
evidenceQuotes: CB-11 Coordinator actions are recorded in an audit log (event creation/editing and message sends).

requirements.text: The system shall support data retention settings (e.g., delete inactive volunteer records after X months).
requirements.responseSummary: Supported based on the capability brief evidence cited.
evidenceQuotes: CB-12 Data retention rules can be configured for inactive volunteers (organization chooses retention period).

requirements.text: The system shall provide accessibility considerations for web UI (keyboard navigation and readable contrast).
requirements.responseSummary: Supported based on the capability brief evidence cited.
evidenceQuotes: CB-13 UI supports mobile browsers and includes keyboard navigation for key workflows.

requirements.text: The platform shall be accessible via modern browsers on desktop and mobile.
requirements.responseSummary: Supported based on the capability brief evidence cited.
evidenceQuotes: CB-13 UI supports mobile browsers and includes keyboard navigation for key workflows.

requirements.text: The platform shall support at least 2,000 registered volunteers.
requirements.responseSummary: Supported based on the capability brief evidence cited.
evidenceQuotes: CB-15 ReliefRoster is designed for organizations up to ~5,000 volunteers on standard deployment.

requirements.text: The platform shall provide basic error handling and clear user guidance.
requirements.responseSummary: Supported in part or requires confirmation based on available evidence.
gapsOrQuestions: The capability brief does not explicitly confirm this requirement. Provide supporting evidence or documentation.

requirements.text: The platform shall ensure that exported data can be downloaded without additional tools.
requirements.responseSummary: Supported based on the capability brief evidence cited.
evidenceQuotes: CB-02 Coordinators can create events and define shifts with capacity limits; volunteers can self-signup for available shifts.

proposalOutline.executiveSummary: MatrixMint provides a proof-locked compliance analysis that maps each requirement to verifiable capability evidence, producing bid-ready exports with conservative coverage classification.
